DataElement.preferredName: Average Time Moderate Level Household Physical Activity Each Occurrence Minute Number
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The average number of minutes of moderate level household physical activity each occurrence.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Average Time Moderate Level Household Physical Activity Each Occurrence
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A statistical calculation describing the central tendency of a set of numbers; used to interpret quantitative data._The continuum of experience in which events pass from the future through the present to the past._A response indicating a moderate level._A social unit comprised of one or more individuals living together (all of whom need not be related) in the same dwelling, who aggregate and share their incomes._Any form of exercise or movement. Physical activity may include planned activity such as walking, running, basketball, or other sports. Physical activity may also include other daily activities such as household chores, yard work, walking the dog, etc._Used to refer to every member of a group of people or things, considered individually._An instance of something happening, such as an event or incident.

ObjectClass.preferredName: Average Time Moderate Level Household Physical Activity
ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A statistical calculation describing the central tendency of a set of numbers; used to interpret quantitative data.:The continuum of experience in which events pass from the future through the present to the past.:A response indicating a moderate level.:A social unit comprised of one or more individuals living together (all of whom need not be related) in the same dwelling, who aggregate and share their incomes.:Any form of exercise or movement. Physical activity may include planned activity such as walking, running, basketball, or other sports. Physical activity may also include other daily activities such as household chores, yard work, walking the dog, etc.

Concepts.definition: A statistical calculation describing the central tendency of a set of numbers; used to interpret quantitative data.
The continuum of experience in which events pass from the future through the present to the past.
A response indicating a moderate level.
A social unit comprised of one or more individuals living together (all of whom need not be related) in the same dwelling, who aggregate and share their incomes.

Any form of exercise or movement. Physical activity may include planned activity such as walking, running, basketball, or other sports. Physical activity may also include other daily activities such as household chores, yard work, walking the dog, etc.

Property.preferredDefinition: Used to refer to every member of a group of people or things, considered individually.:An instance of something happening, such as an event or incident.

Concepts.definition: Used to refer to every member of a group of people or things, considered individually.
An instance of something happening, such as an event or incident.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: An action taken in pursuit of an objective; the state of being active.

DataElementConcept.changeDescription: . OK to release per KM. AK 2020-10-19

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Length or duration of an event or activity measured in minutes.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Tests, examinations, evaluations used to determine a subject's status or response to intervention.
ConceptualDomain.changeDescription: Created initially to support CCR value domain for CTMS.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A unit measure of time equal to 60 seconds.:Number; a concept of quantity derived from zero and units; a numeral or string of numerals that is used for identification.

Concepts.definition: A unit measure of time equal to 60 seconds.
A numeral or string of numerals expressing value, quantity, or identification.
